name: World Summit and Expo on Pharmacology and Pharmaceutics
content: About WSEPP2024 It is a great pleasure for us to invite you all to participate as speaker, delegate, sponsor and/or as exhibitor at the World Summit and Expo on Pharmacology and Pharmaceutics (WSEPP2024), which will be held in Nice, France during September 19-21, 2024\. Scheduled to take place from September 19-21, 2024 in the beautiful city of Nice, our summit aims to bring together the leading experts in the fields of pharmacology and pharmaceutics. This international platform will provide an exceptional opportunity to exchange knowledge, foster collaborations, and explore innovative solutions that address the pressing challenges facing our world today. We believe worldwide scientists, academicians, government institutions, students, scholars, entrepreneurs in the fields will create huge opportunities by showcasing the growth and breakthrough of pharmaceutics at a time when so many new innovations and challenges are available. The WSEPP2024 is a dedicated conference where you will have the opportunity to learn about new developments and share aspects of your own work in the fields of pharma by sharing poster works or oral presentations. With high efficient and tight communication with outstanding experts worldwide, we hope productive discussions would stimulate creative ideas to translate new discoveries into better practice and application. Finally, we hope and trust that you will find the conference and your visit to the very beautiful and exciting city of Nice, in September 2024 both valuable and enjoyable!
